description: Returns information about a specific domain recordset.

parameters.name: domainName
parameters.description: The domain name for which your want to return information about.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the domain.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the domain recordset ( arn:aws:lightsail:global:123456789101:Domain/824cede0-abc7-4f84-8dbc-12345EXAMPLE).

nested_items.name: supportCode
nested_items.description: The support code. Include this code in your email to support when you have questions about an instance or another resource in Lightsail. This code enables our support team to look up your Lightsail information more easily.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The date when the domain recordset was created.

nested_items.name: availabilityZone
nested_items.description: The Availability Zone. Follows the format us-east-2a (case-sensitive).

nested_items.name: regionName
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Region name.

nested_items.name: resourceType
nested_items.description: The resource type.

nested_items.name: tags
nested_items.description: The tag keys and optional values for the resource. For more information about tags in Lightsail, see the Amazon Lightsail Developer Guide.

nested_items.name: key
nested_items.description: The key of the tag.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The value of the tag.

nested_items.name: domainEntries
nested_items.description: An array of key-value pairs containing information about the domain entries.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the domain recordset entry.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the domain.

nested_items.name: target
nested_items.description: The target IP address ( 192.0.2.0), or AWS name server ( ns-111.awsdns-22.com.).

nested_items.name: isAlias
nested_items.description: When true, specifies whether the domain entry is an alias used by the Lightsail load balancer, Lightsail container service, Lightsail content delivery network (CDN) distribution, or another Amazon Web Services resource. You can include an alias (A type) record in your request, which points to the DNS name of a load balancer, container service, CDN distribution, or other Amazon Web Services resource and routes traffic to that resource.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of domain entry, such as address for IPv4 (A), address for IPv6 (AAAA), canonical name (CNAME), mail exchanger (MX), name server (NS), start of authority (SOA), service locator (SRV), or text (TXT).
A.
AAAA.
CNAME.
MX.
NS.
SOA.
SRV.
TXT.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: registeredDomainDelegationInfo
nested_items.description: An object that describes the state of the Route 53 domain delegation to a Lightsail DNS zone.

nested_items.name: nameServersUpdateState
nested_items.description: An object that describes the state of the name server records that are automatically added to the Route 53 domain by Lightsail.

nested_items.name: code
nested_items.description: The status code for the name servers update.
SUCCEEDED - The name server records were successfully updated.
PENDING - The name server record update is in progress.
FAILED - The name server record update failed.
STARTED - The automatic name server record update started.

nested_items.name: message
nested_items.description: The message that describes the reason for the status code.

nested_items.name: r53HostedZoneDeletionState
nested_items.description: Describes the deletion state of an Amazon Route 53 hosted zone for a domain that is being automatically delegated to an Amazon Lightsail DNS zone.

nested_items.name: code
nested_items.description: The status code for the deletion state.
SUCCEEDED - The hosted zone was successfully deleted.
PENDING - The hosted zone deletion is in progress.
FAILED - The hosted zone deletion failed.
STARTED - The hosted zone deletion started.

nested_items.name: message
nested_items.description: The message that describes the reason for the status code.
